name: Doll Maker Pearlhorizon
description: A mad Banshee who would do anything for her dream, no matter the risk
story: A Banshee who dreams of a peaceful life in a house full of dolls. Unfortunately, her means of achieving her dreams are extremely violent. Tired of trying to collect dolls, she's now on a journey to learn how to make them herself.
get_line: Will you please...become my doll? I'll make you so pretty...

relations.description: Pearlhorizon wants Yuna to teach her how to make dolls.
Pearlhorizon wanted to add Fighter Maya to her collection, but since she gave her some useful information, Pearlhorizon decided to leave her be.
Pearlhorizon thinks Auxiliary Lots is a pretty doll, but he doesn't listen to what she says.

specialty.name: Puppet Master
specialty.description: She does not care what she has to do, as long as she can make a pretty doll.

skills.name: Endless Nightmare
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense for 2 turns and deals additional damage equivalent to 15% of the target's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense for 2 turns and deals additional damage equivalent to 30% of the target's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Health.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 12%.
Increases Health by 20%.
Increases Hypnosis's sleep effect chance.
Increases Hypnosis's sleep effect chance by 5%.
Increases Hypnosis's sleep effect chance by 15%.
Increases Hypnosis's sleep effect chance by 30%.
Increases Chaos Strike's decrease Hit Chance effect chance.
Increases Chaos Strike's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 1%.
Increases Chaos Strike's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 2%.
Increases Chaos Strike's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 5%.
Increases Effectiveness.
Increases Effectiveness by 3%.
Increases Effectiveness by 8%.
Increases Effectiveness by 15%.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness when using Hypnosis.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 5% when using Hypnosis.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% when using Hypnosis.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 30% when using Hypnosis.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 1%.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 5%.
Has a chance to decrease Hypnosis's cooldown by 1 turn when using Endless Nightmare.
Has a 5% chance to decrease Hypnosis's cooldown by 1 turn when using Endless Nightmare.
Has a 15% chance to decrease Hypnosis's cooldown by 1 turn when using Endless Nightmare.
Has a 30% chance to decrease Hypnosis's cooldown by 1 turn when using Endless Nightmare.
When attacked, has a 20% chance to decrease damage received. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
When attacked, has a 20% chance to decrease damage received by 5%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
When attacked, has a 20% chance to decrease damage received by 15%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
When attacked, has a 20% chance to decrease damage received by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
Has a chance to decrease Speed of the enemy for 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a 15% chance to decrease Speed of the enemy for 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a 40% chance to decrease Speed of the enemy for 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has an 80% chance to decrease Speed of the enemy for 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a chance to extend the duration of sleep to 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a 4% chance to extend the duration of sleep to 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a 10% chance to extend the duration of sleep to 2 turns when using Hypnosis.
Has a 20% chance to extend the duration of sleep to 2 turns when using Hypnosis.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

localize.name: 人形作家 パール・ホライゾン

skill1.name: 渾沌
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で命中率DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 催眠
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で睡眠を1ターンの間付与する。睡眠を付与した回数ｘ10%、自身のアクションゲージをUPさせる。

skill3.name: 果てしなき悪夢
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。対象が睡眠状態の場合、防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与し、対象の最大生命力の15%の追加ダメージが発生する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。対象が睡眠状態の場合、防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与し、対象の最大生命力の15%の追加ダメージが発生する。
